name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Royal Tiles Resource Pack
detailed_description:
No fantasy game is complete without a grand castle for its kings and queens!

Royal Tiles Resource pack is a tile add-on that will help you create the perfect castle. Besides the essential throne room, this set also contains tiles for a royal garden as well as an elaborate dining room. Elaborate textures and fine details will help you achieve the look of perfect opulence and greatness.

This resource pack includes:
  • Auto-tiles A1-A5
  • Animated character sets: door, gate and fountain
  • Tile B with decorations for a castle hall, throne room and waiting room
  • Tile C with decorations for a royal banquet, kitchen and bedrooms
  • Tile D with outside decorations for a royal garden, royal wedding or a complex maze

  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
